Reviews.Title: “motel 6”
Reviews.Author: Altov36
Reviews.Content: ive stayed motel 6 enjoyed trip booked motel 6 arrived wait 2 hours hotel nice morning roach bathroom killed told manager move promised refund fee nice roach light bathroom day received discount stay motel 6 northwest hwy dallas tx dont stay motel 6 unless roaches

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: hokiemom05
Reviews.Content: staff exceptional arriving late night horrible trip trying break record cancelled rerouted flights day greeted pleasant helpful staff morning staff offered print boarding passes helpful local directions items breakfastnot carbs lot clean comfortable price beware shuttle service issue website updated

HotelInfo.Name: Motel 6 Dallas
HotelInfo.Address: 2380 West Northwest Hwy, Dallas, TX 75220 (Formerly La Quinta Inn and Suites Dallas Northwest)
